data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Leon have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 3, Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 7, Free kick Leon.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a throw-in for Leon, close to Tijuana de Caliente's area.
In the minute 9, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
Rodolfo Cota is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Rodolfo Cota is back on his feet again.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 14, Tijuana de Caliente are pushing forward but Fabian Castillo's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Jose Rodriguez for Leon drives towards goal at Estadio Leon. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Leon.
Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 17, Leon to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Joel Campbell of Leon gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
In the minute 18, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Leon throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
Leon's Luis Montes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Victor Guzman (Tijuana de Caliente) has received a yellow card from Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Leon.
In Leon Tijuana de Caliente drive forward through Christian Rivera. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 28, Throw-in high up the field for Leon in Leon.
Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 31, Attention is being given to Leonâ€™s Joel Campbell and play has been suspended briefly.
The match at Estadio Leon has been interrupted briefly for a check on Marcel Ruiz, who is down injured.
Marcel Ruiz (Tijuana de Caliente) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Leon in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Leon's Joel Campbell is back in action after a slight knock.
Tijuana de Caliente's Marcel Ruiz looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 35, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Leon.
Tijuana de Caliente's Mauro Lainez breaks free at Estadio Leon. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 41, Play has been interrupted briefly in Leon to check on Jose Rodriguez, who is grimacing with pain.
Jose Rodriguez is back on the pitch.
Tijuana de Caliente needs to be cautious. Leon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 43, Can Leon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Leon.
Tijuana de Caliente drives forward and Fabian Castillo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 44, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo waits before resuming play because William Tesillo for Leon is still down.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 45, Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a penalty in Leon...
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The home team has substituted William Tesillo with Angel Mena. Marcos Ignacio Ambriz is thus making his first change.
Goal! Bryan Angulo gives Tijuana de Caliente a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Estadio Leon.
Leon push forward at Estadio Leon and Luis Montes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tijuana de Caliente defence.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Leon.
Tijuana de Caliente's Fabian Castillo misses with an attempt on goal.
Leon have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the away team a throw-in.
Bryan Angulo for Tijuana de Caliente gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Leon a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Angel Mena of Leon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Leon.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
In the minute 54, Leon are coming forward and David Ramirez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
Free kick Leon.
In the minute 56, Free kick in a good position for Leon!
Jean Meneses is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
The home team replace Fernando Navarro with Emanuel Gigliotti.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Leon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 60, Leon's Yairo Moreno misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
In the minute 61, Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Clifford Aboagye is replacing Marcel Ruiz for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Leon.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 64, Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick Tijuana de Caliente.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Leon throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Luis Montes of Leon gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
In the minute 72, Pablo Guede is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Leon with Jaime Gomez replacing Mauro Lainez.
In the minute 73, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Emanuel Gigliotti is on target to give Leon a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 76, Play has been interrupted briefly in Leon to check on Stiven Barreiro, who is grimacing with pain.
Osvaldo Rodriguez (Leon) has replaced the possibly injured Stiven Barreiro at Estadio Leon.
The home team have replaced Joel Campbell with Armando Leon. This is the third substitution made today by Marcos Ignacio Ambriz.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Pablo Guede (Tijuana de Caliente) is making a third substitution, with Paolo Yrizar replacing Jordi Cortizo.
In the minute 80, Edgar Lopez is replacing Luis Gamiz for the away team.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon.
In Leon Leon attack through Luis Montes. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 84, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Emanuel Gigliotti gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leon.
In the minute 87, Tijuana de Caliente are pushing forward but Bryan Angulo's finish is wide of the goal.
Leon have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
At Estadio Leon the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Luis Montes for Leon has been booked by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo and receives a first yellow card.
